titlestmt.titleproper: Minutes of Meetings of the Arizona Board of World's Fair Managers 1891-1893

did.head: Collection Summary
did.unittitle: Minutes of Meetings of the Arizona Board of World's Fair Managers 1891-1893

origination.label: Creator
origination.corpname: Arizona. Board of World's Fair Managers.

did.abstract: The Board was established to supervise the collection and arrangement of the exhibits from Arizona to the 1893 Columbian Exposition in Chicago. Holograph and typescript record of meeting minutes kept by the secretary, Louis C. Hughes.

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: University of Arizona Libraries, Special Collections

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: There are no restrictions on this collection.

userestrict.head: Copyright
userestrict.p: It is the responsibility of the user to obtain permission to publish from the owner of the copyright (the institution, the creator of the record, the author or his/her transferees, heirs, legates, or literary executors). The user agrees to indemnify and hold harmless the Arizona Board of Regents for the University of Arizona, its officers, employees, and agents from and against all claims made by any person asserting that he or she is an owner of copyright.

prefercite.head: Credit Line
prefercite.p: Minutes of Meetings of the Arizona Board of World's Fair Managers (AZ 162). Special Collections, University of Arizona Libraries.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: The Board was established to supervise the collection and arrangement of the exhibits from Arizona to the 1893 Columbian Exposition in Chicago.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Holograph and typescript record of meeting minutes kept by the secretary, Louis C. Hughes. Newspaper clippings of the published minutes are included.

controlaccess.corpname: World's Columbian Exposition (1893 : Chicago, Ill.) -- Arizona
